reviews.review: After 2+ thousand across 3 accounts I really enjoy the game with the competitive grind to it, for anyone into hardcore mechanical shooters willing to get really good, and bang out noobs go for it its really worth it.
PODOBA SIE FEST , GRAĆ NIE CZITOWAC !!!

Nie ma co tu dużo mówić. Rozgrywka bardzo przyjemna, pomimo trafiających się toksycznych graczy, jak się ma znajomych do grania to można na prawdę miło spędzić wolny czas. Bardzo również polecam serwery społecznościowe, na których można poznać nowych ludzi i sobie luźno pogadać. Jeżeli chodzi o minus tej gry to jest ilość cheaterów. Dlatego polecam kupić Prime, chociaż tam też cię czasem ktoś znajdzie.
Podsumowując, gra godna polecenia.
Velice dobrá hra dokud nechytnu opice do týmu a nemám chuť rozmrdat vše kolem mě.
Nie ma drugiej tak wnerwiającej gry :(

Easily one of the best fps games out there.  Well balanced, good progression system. Ton of fun, my dad played counter strike with my father way back and I can easily see playing this with my kids.
se vc gosta de ficar sofrendo contra hack, achou seu jogo! Já erá foda quando era pago, depois que ficou de graça eh uma briga pra ver quem usa hack melhor passando pelo VAC.

Good game, makes fun and can be pretty enjoyable, IF there were not that many cheaters or other third party program users that have an easy acces to the game and can even play ranked with cheats etc, since Valve does not rly care about that tbh.
A good gaming chair is necessary
This is a very good game. 😉

Broken game with lots of cheaters. No actions done to eliminate this problem. Focusing only for profiting and not to customer satisfaction (which is playing this game w/o cheaters). Last but not least, no option to search servers on selected regions.

Its a fun but hard game  you should pratice alot if you want to be good at it but if you get good it will get easy i recommend you to find your own style and to learn the maps out of your head it will help you alot later in the game.
El juego me encanta pero me gustaria que se pudiera abrir cajas de alguna manera gratuita pero me encanta.
